com.xith3d.scenegraph
Class SpotLight

java.lang.Object
  com.xith3d.scenegraph.SceneGraphObject
      com.xith3d.scenegraph.Node
          com.xith3d.scenegraph.Leaf
              com.xith3d.scenegraph.Light
                  com.xith3d.scenegraph.PointLight
                      com.xith3d.scenegraph.SpotLight
public class SpotLight
extends PointLight

SpotLight defines a point light source located at some point in space and radiating in a specific direction.
